```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=F, fig.align = "center", message=F, warning=F, fig.height = 5, fig.width = 5, fig.cap = '안녕하세요', cache=T, dpi = 300)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
x <- rnorm(100)
y <- x*2 + rnorm(100)
lm(y~x) %>% summary()
m <- coef(lm(y~x))
plot(x,y)
abline(m, col='red')
abline(v=0,h=0, col='blue')


```
